dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents statewide groundwater management plan boundaries within the state of California. These boundaries were originally developed for the California Water Plan Update (2013).This layer is intended to be used as a compliment to data, reports, and other information provided by the California Groundwater Information Center.
